GE07mbh_11_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_11_u:001.001a: hate duryodhane caiva hate sainye ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.001c: dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājaḥ śrutvā kim akaron mune
GE07mbh_11_u:001.002c: kṛpaprabhṛtayaś caiva kim akurvata te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.003c: vṛttāntam uttaraṃ brūhi yad abhāṣata saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.004a: hate putraśate dīnaṃ chinnaśākham iva drumam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.006a: kiṃ śocasi mahārāja nāsti śoke sahāyatā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.006c: akṣauhiṇyo hatāś cāṣṭau daśa caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_11_u:001.007c: sahitās tava putreṇa sarve vai nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.009c: papāta bhuvi durdharṣo vātāhata iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.010c: duḥkhaṃ nūnaṃ bhaviṣyāmi vicaran pṛthivīm imām
GE07mbh_11_u:001.011a: kiṃ nu bandhuvihīnasya jīvitena mamādya vai
GE07mbh_11_u:001.012a: hṛtarājyo hatasuhṛd dhatacakṣuś ca vai tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.013a: na kṛtaṃ suhṛdāṃ vākyaṃ jāmadagnyasya jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.014a: sabhāmadhye tu kṛṣṇena yac chreyo 'bhihitaṃ mama
GE07mbh_11_u:001.014c: alaṃ vaireṇa te rājan putraḥ saṃgṛhyatām iti
GE07mbh_11_u:001.015a: tac ca vākyam akṛtvāhaṃ bhṛśaṃ tapyāmi durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.015c: na hi śrotāsmi bhīṣmasya dharmayuktaṃ prabhāṣitam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.017a: na smarāmy ātmanaḥ kiṃ cit purā saṃjaya duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.017c: yasyedaṃ phalam adyeha mayā mūḍhena bhujyate
GE07mbh_11_u:001.018a: nūnaṃ hy apakṛtaṃ kiṃ cin mayā pūrveṣu janmasu
GE07mbh_11_u:001.018c: yena māṃ duḥkhabhāgeṣu dhātā karmasu yuktavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.019a: pariṇāmaś ca vayasaḥ sarvabandhukṣayaś ca me
GE07mbh_11_u:001.019e: ko 'nyo 'sti duḥkhitataro mayā loke pumān iha
GE07mbh_11_u:001.020a: tan mām adyaiva paśyantu pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.022a: śokaṃ rājan vyapanuda śrutās te vedaniścayāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.022e: sṛñjaye putraśokārte yad ūcur munayaḥ purā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.023a: tathā yauvanajaṃ darpam āsthite te sute nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:001.023c: na tvayā suhṛdāṃ vākyaṃ bruvatām avadhāritam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.023e: svārthaś ca na kṛtaḥ kaś cil lubdhena phalagṛddhinā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.024a: tava duḥśāsano mantrī rādheyaś ca durātmavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.024c: śakuniś caiva duṣṭātmā citrasenaś ca durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.024e: śalyaś ca yena vai sarvaṃ śalyabhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025b-0004_01: droṇasya ca mahārāja kṛpasya ca śaradvataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025b-0004_02: kṛṣṇasya ca mahābāho nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025c: na kṛtaṃ vacanaṃ tena tava putreṇa bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025d-0005_01: alpabuddhir ahaṃkārī nityaṃ yuddham iti bruvan
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025d-0005_02: krūro durmarṣaṇo nityam asaṃtuṣṭaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.025d-0005_03: śrutavān asi medhāvī satyavāṃś caiva nityadā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.026a: na dharmaḥ satkṛtaḥ kaś cin nityaṃ yuddham iti bruvan
GE07mbh_11_u:001.026c: kṣapitāḥ kṣatriyāḥ sarve śatrūṇāṃ vardhitaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.027a: madhyastho hi tvam apy āsīr na kṣamaṃ kiṃ cid uktavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.027c: dhūr dhareṇa tvayā bhāras tulayā na samaṃ dhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.028a: ādāv eva manuṣyeṇa vartitavyaṃ yathā kṣamam
GE07mbh_11_u:001.028c: yathā nātītam arthaṃ vai paścāttāpena yujyate
GE07mbh_11_u:001.029a: putragṛddhyā tvayā rājan priyaṃ tasya cikīrṣatā
GE07mbh_11_u:001.029c: paścāttāpam idaṃ prāptaṃ na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:001.030a: madhu yaḥ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭvā prapātaṃ nānupaśyati
GE07mbh_11_u:001.030c: sa bhraṣṭo madhulobhena śocaty eva yathā bhavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.031a: arthān na śocan prāpnoti na śocan vindate sukham
GE07mbh_11_u:001.031c: na śocañ śriyam āpnoti na śocan vindate param
GE07mbh_11_u:001.032c: dahyamāno manastāpaṃ bhajate na sa paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.034a: tasmin samiddhe patitāḥ śalabhā iva te sutāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.034c: tān keśavārcir nirdagdhān na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:001.035c: aśāstradṛṣṭam etad dhi na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:001.036a: visphuliṅgā iva hy etān dahanti kila mānavān
GE07mbh_11_u:001.036c: jahīhi manyuṃ buddhyā vai dhārayātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.001c: vaicitravīryaṃ viduro yad uvāca nibodha tat
GE07mbh_11_u:002.002a: uttiṣṭha rājan kiṃ śeṣe dhārayātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.002d-0006_01: eṣā vai sarvasattvānāṃ lokeśvara parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.004a: yadā śūraṃ ca bhīruṃ ca yamaḥ karṣati bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:002.004c: tat kiṃ na yotsyanti hi te kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
GE07mbh_11_u:002.005c: kālaṃ prāpya mahārāja na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_11_u:002.005d-0007_03: na śocan mṛtam anveti na śocan mriyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.005d-0007_05: kālaḥ karṣati bhūtāni sarvāṇi vividhāny uta
GE07mbh_11_u:002.005d-0007_06: na kālasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyaḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_11_u:002.005d-0007_10: yasya kālaḥ prayāty agre tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.006a: na cāpy etān hatān yuddhe rājañ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:002.006c: pramāṇaṃ yadi śāstrāṇi gatās te paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:002.007a: sarve svādhyāyavanto hi sarve ca caritavratāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.007c: sarve cābhimukhāḥ kṣīṇās tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.008c: na te tava na teṣāṃ tvaṃ tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.009a: hato 'pi labhate svargaṃ hatvā ca labhate yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.009c: ubhayaṃ no bahuguṇaṃ nāsti niṣphalatā raṇe
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011a: na yajñair dakṣiṇāvadbhir na tapobhir na vidyayā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011c: svargaṃ yānti tathā martyā yathā śūrā raṇe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011d-0008_02: hūyamānāñ śarāṃś caiva sehus tejasvino mithaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011d-0008_03: evaṃ rājaṃs tavācakṣe svargyaṃ panthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011d-0008_04: na yuddhād adhikaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyasyeha vidyate
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011d-0008_06: āśiṣaḥ paramāḥ prāptā na śocyāḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_11_u:002.011d-0008_08: nādya śokābhibhūtas tvaṃ kāryam utsraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:002.012c: saṃsāreṣv anubhūtāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
GE07mbh_11_u:002.013c: divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
GE07mbh_11_u:002.014a: na kālasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyaḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_11_u:002.014c: na madhyasthaḥ kva cit kālaḥ sarvaṃ kālaḥ prakarṣati
GE07mbh_11_u:002.014d-0009_01: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.014d-0009_02: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.015c: ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyed eṣu na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.016a: na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:002.016c: apy abhāvena yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
GE07mbh_11_u:002.017c: bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
GE07mbh_11_u:002.017e: cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaś cāpi vivardhate
GE07mbh_11_u:002.019a: nārtho na dharmo na sukhaṃ yad etad anuśocasi
GE07mbh_11_u:002.019c: na ca nāpaiti kāryārthāt trivargāc caiva bhraśyate
GE07mbh_11_u:002.020a: anyām anyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.021a: prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.021c: etaj jñānasya sāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023a: yasyāṃ yasyām avasthāyāṃ yat karoti śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023c: tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ tat tat phalam upāśnute
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_01: yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_02: tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_03: ātmaiva hy ātmano mitram ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_04: ātmaiva hy ātmanaḥ sākṣī kṛtasyāpakṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_05: śubhena karmaṇā saukhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpena karmaṇā
GE07mbh_11_u:002.023d-0011_06: kṛtaṃ bhavati sarvatra nākṛtaṃ bhujyate kva cit
GE07mbh_11_u:003.001c: bhuya eva tu vākyāni śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.002a: aniṣṭānāṃ ca saṃsargād iṣṭānāṃ ca vivarjanāt
GE07mbh_11_u:003.002c: kathaṃ hi mānasair duḥkhaiḥ pramucyante 'tra paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.003a: yato yato mano duḥkhāt sukhād vāpi pramucyate
GE07mbh_11_u:003.003c: tatas tataḥ śamaṃ labdhvā sugatiṃ vindate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.004c: kadalīsaṃnibho lokaḥ sāro hy asya na vidyate
GE07mbh_11_u:003.004d-0012_01: yadā prājñāś ca mūḍhāś ca dhanavanto 'tha nirdhanāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.004d-0012_04: kiṃ viśeṣaṃ prapaśyanti tatra teṣāṃ pare janāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.005a: gṛhāṇy eva hi martyānām āhur dehāni paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.005c: kālena viniyujyante sattvam ekaṃ tu śobhanam
GE07mbh_11_u:003.006a: yathā jīrṇam ajīrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ tyaktvā tu vai naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.006c: anyad rocayate vastram evaṃ dehāḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:003.007a: vaicitravīrya vāsaṃ hi duḥkhaṃ vā yadi vā sukham
GE07mbh_11_u:003.008a: karmaṇā prāpyate svargaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:003.008c: tato vahati taṃ bhāram avaśaḥ svavaśo 'pi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:003.009a: yathā ca mṛnmayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ cakrārūḍhaṃ vipadyate
GE07mbh_11_u:003.009c: kiṃ cit prakriyamāṇaṃ vā kṛtamātram athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:003.010a: chinnaṃ vāpy avaropyantam avatīrṇam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:003.010c: ārdraṃ vāpy atha vā śuṣkaṃ pacyamānam athāpi vā
GE07mbh_11_u:003.011c: atha vā paribhujyantam evaṃ dehāḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:003.012a: garbhastho vā prasūto vāpy atha vā divasāntaraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.014a: prākkarmabhis tu bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:003.015a: yathā ca salile rājan krīḍārtham anusaṃcaran
GE07mbh_11_u:003.015c: unmajjec ca nimajjec ca kiṃ cit sattvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_11_u:003.017a: ye tu prājñāḥ sthitāḥ satye saṃsārāntagaveṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:003.017c: samāgamajñā bhūtānāṃ te yānti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:004.001c: etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tattvam ākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.002a: janmaprabhṛti bhūtānāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ śṛṇu prabho
GE07mbh_11_u:004.002c: pūrvam eveha kalale vasate kiṃ cid antaram
GE07mbh_11_u:004.002d-0014_01: tatas tu vāyuvegena kalalaṃ kiṃ cid antaram
GE07mbh_11_u:004.003a: tataḥ sa pañcame 'tīte māse māṃsaṃ prakalpayet
GE07mbh_11_u:004.004c: tatas tu vāyuvegena ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.006a: tasmān muktaḥ sa saṃsārād anyān paśyaty upadravān
GE07mbh_11_u:004.007a: tataḥ prāptottare kāle vyādhayaś cāpi taṃ tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:004.008e: badhyamānaś ca tair bhūyo naiva tṛptim upaiti saḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.008f-0015_01: tadā na vetti caivāyaṃ prakurvan sādhv asādhunī
GE07mbh_11_u:004.009a: ayaṃ na budhyate tāvad yamalokam athāgatam
GE07mbh_11_u:004.009c: yamadūtair vikṛṣyaṃś ca mṛtyuṃ kālena gacchati
GE07mbh_11_u:004.010a: vāgghīnasya ca yanmātram iṣṭāniṣṭaṃ kṛtaṃ mukhe
GE07mbh_11_u:004.011a: aho vinikṛto loko lobhena ca vaśīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013a: mūrkhān iti parān āha nātmānaṃ samavekṣate
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013c: śikṣāṃ kṣipati cānyeṣāṃ nātmānaṃ śāstum icchati
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013d-0017_01: yadā prājñāś ca mūḍhāś ca dhanavanto 'tha nirdhanāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013d-0017_05: kiṃ viśeṣaṃ prapaśyanti tatra teṣāṃ pare janāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013d-0017_07: yadā sarve samaṃ nyastāḥ svapanti dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013d-0017_08: kasmād anyonyam icchanti pralabdhum iha durbudhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:004.013d-0017_09: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca yo niśamya śrutiṃ tv imām
GE07mbh_11_u:004.015a: evaṃ sarvaṃ viditvā vai yas tattvam anuvartate
GE07mbh_11_u:005.001c: etad vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ buddhimārgaṃ praśaṃsa me
GE07mbh_11_u:005.003a: kaś cin mahati saṃsāre vartamāno dvijaḥ kila
GE07mbh_11_u:005.005a: tad asya dṛṣṭvā hṛdayam udvegam agamat param
GE07mbh_11_u:005.005c: abhyucchrayaś ca romṇāṃ vai vikriyāś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_11_u:005.005d-0019_01: vepathuś cābhavad gātre romaharṣaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:005.006a: sa tad vanaṃ vyanusaran vipradhāvan itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.006c: vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ śaraṇaṃ kva bhaved iti
GE07mbh_11_u:005.007a: sa teṣāṃ chidram anvicchan pradruto bhayapīḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.007c: na ca niryāti vai dūraṃ na ca tair viprayujyate
GE07mbh_11_u:005.011a: papāta sa dvijas tatra nigūḍhe salilāśaye
GE07mbh_11_u:005.012c: sa tathā lambate tatra ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.013a: atha tatrāpi cānyo 'sya bhūyo jāta upadravaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.015e: āsate madhu saṃbhṛtya pūrvam eva niketajāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.016c: svādanīyāni bhūtānāṃ na yair bālo 'pi tṛpyate
GE07mbh_11_u:005.017a: teṣāṃ madhūnāṃ bahudhā dhārā prasravate sadā
GE07mbh_11_u:005.017c: tāṃ lambamānaḥ sa pumān dhārāṃ pibati sarvadā
GE07mbh_11_u:005.017e: na cāsya tṛṣṇā viratā pibamānasya saṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_11_u:005.018a: abhīpsati ca tāṃ nityam atṛptaḥ sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.018c: na cāsya jīvite rājan nirvedaḥ samajāyata
GE07mbh_11_u:005.019c: kṛṣṇāḥ śvetāś ca taṃ vṛkṣaṃ kuṭṭayanti sma mūṣakāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:005.020a: vyālaiś ca vanadurgānte striyā ca paramograyā
GE07mbh_11_u:005.020c: kūpādhastāc ca nāgena vīnāhe kuñjareṇa ca
GE07mbh_11_u:005.021a: vṛkṣaprapātāc ca bhayaṃ mūṣakebhyaś ca pañcamam
GE07mbh_11_u:005.021c: madhulobhān madhukaraiḥ ṣaṣṭham āhur mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_11_u:005.022a: evaṃ sa vasate tatra kṣiptaḥ saṃsārasāgare
GE07mbh_11_u:006.001a: aho khalu mahad duḥkhaṃ kṛcchravāsaṃ vasaty asau
GE07mbh_11_u:006.001c: kathaṃ tasya ratis tatra tuṣṭir vā vadatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_11_u:006.002a: sa deśaḥ kva nu yatrāsau vasate dharmasaṃkaṭe
GE07mbh_11_u:006.002c: kathaṃ vā sa vimucyeta naras tasmān mahābhayāt
GE07mbh_11_u:006.003a: etan me sarvam ācakṣva sādhu ceṣṭāmahe tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:006.003c: kṛpā me mahatī jātā tasyābhyuddharaṇena hi
GE07mbh_11_u:006.005a: yat tad ucyati kāntāraṃ mahat saṃsāra eva saḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.005c: vanaṃ durgaṃ hi yat tv etat saṃsāragahanaṃ hi tat
GE07mbh_11_u:006.006a: ye ca te kathitā vyālā vyādhayas te prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.006c: yā sā nārī bṛhatkāyā adhitiṣṭhati tatra vai
GE07mbh_11_u:006.006e: tām āhus tu jarāṃ prājñā varṇarūpavināśinīm
GE07mbh_11_u:006.007a: yas tatra kūpo nṛpate sa tu dehaḥ śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:006.007c: yas tatra vasate 'dhastān mahāhiḥ kāla eva saḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.008a: kūpamadhye ca yā jātā vallī yatra sa mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.008c: pratāne lambate sā tu jīvitāśā śarīriṇām
GE07mbh_11_u:006.009a: sa yas tu kūpavīnāhe taṃ vṛkṣaṃ parisarpati
GE07mbh_11_u:006.009c: ṣaḍvaktraḥ kuñjaro rājan sa tu saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.009e: mukhāni ṛtavo māsāḥ pādā dvādaśa kīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.010a: ye tu vṛkṣaṃ nikṛntanti mūṣakāḥ satatotthitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.010c: rātryahāni tu tāny āhur bhūtānāṃ paricintakāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.010e: ye te madhukarās tatra kāmās te parikīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.011a: yās tu tā bahuśo dhārāḥ sravanti madhunisravam
GE07mbh_11_u:006.011c: tāṃs tu kāmarasān vidyād yatra majjanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.012a: evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya parivṛttiṃ sma ye viduḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.012c: te vai saṃsāracakrasya pāśāṃś chindanti vai budhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:006.012d-0022_01: śatāt sahasrāl lakṣād vā nirvedo yasya jāyate
GE07mbh_11_u:007.001c: bhūya eva tu me harṣaḥ śrotuṃ vāgamṛtaṃ tava
GE07mbh_11_u:007.003a: yathā tu puruṣo rājan dīrgham adhvānam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.003c: kva cit kva cic chramāt sthātā kurute vāsam eva vā
GE07mbh_11_u:007.004c: kurvanti durbudhā vāsaṃ mucyante tatra paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.005a: tasmād adhvānam evaitam āhuḥ śāstravido janāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.005c: yat tu saṃsāragahanaṃ vanam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.006c: carāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.007a: śārīrā mānasāś caiva martyānāṃ ye tu vyādhayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.007c: pratyakṣāś ca parokṣāś ca te vyālāḥ kathitā budhaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.008a: kliśyamānāś ca tair nityaṃ hanyamānāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:007.009a: athāpi tair vimucyeta vyādhibhiḥ puruṣo nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:007.009c: āvṛṇoty eva taṃ paścāj jarā rūpavināśinī
GE07mbh_11_u:007.011c: krameṇāsya pralumpanti rūpam āyus tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:007.012a: ete kālasya nidhayo naitāñ jānanti durbudhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.013a: rathaṃ śarīraṃ bhūtānāṃ sattvam āhus tu sārathim
GE07mbh_11_u:007.013c: indriyāṇi hayān āhuḥ karma buddhiś ca raśmayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.014a: teṣāṃ hayānāṃ yo vegaṃ dhāvatām anudhāvati
GE07mbh_11_u:007.014d-0023_01: bhramamāṇā na muhyanti saṃsāre na bhramanti te
GE07mbh_11_u:007.014d-0023_02: saṃsāre bhramatāṃ rājan duḥkham etad dhi jāyate
GE07mbh_11_u:007.014d-0023_03: tasmād asya nivṛttyarthaṃ yatnam evācared budhaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.014d-0023_06: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satyavādī yaḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati
GE07mbh_11_u:007.015a: yas tān yamayate buddhyā sa yantā na nivartate
GE07mbh_11_u:007.015c: yāmyam āhū rathaṃ hy enaṃ muhyante yena durbudhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.016a: sa caitat prāpnute rājan yat tvaṃ prāpto narādhipa
GE07mbh_11_u:007.018a: na vikramo na cāpy artho na mitraṃ na suhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.019a: tasmān maitraṃ samāsthāya śīlam āpadya bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:007.019c: damas tyāgo 'pramādaś ca te trayo brahmaṇo hayāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020c: tyaktvā mṛtyubhayaṃ rājan brahmalokaṃ sa gacchati
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_02: sa gacchati paraṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇoḥ padam anāmayam
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_03: na tat kratusahasreṇa nopavāsaiś ca nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_04: abhayasya ca dānena yat phalaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_05: na hy ātmanaḥ priyataraṃ kiṃ cid bhūteṣu niścitam
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_07: tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayā kāryā vipaścitā
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0026_09: asūkṣmadṛṣṭayo mandā bhrāmyante tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0027_01: evaṃ jñātvā mahāprājña sa teṣām aurdhvadaihikam
GE07mbh_11_u:007.020d-0027_02: kartum arhasi tenaiva phalaṃ prāpsyasi vai sukham
GE07mbh_11_u:008.001a: vidurasya tu tad vākyaṃ niśamya kurusattamaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.002a: taṃ tathā patitaṃ bhūmau niḥsaṃjñaṃ prekṣya bāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.002c: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaś caiva kṣattā ca viduras tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:008.003a: saṃjayaḥ suhṛdaś cānye dvāḥsthā ye cāsya saṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.004a: paspṛśuś ca karair gātraṃ vījamānāś ca yatnataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.006a: dhig astu khalu mānuṣyaṃ mānuṣye ca parigraham
GE07mbh_11_u:008.008a: yena dahyanti gātrāṇi yena prajñā vinaśyati
GE07mbh_11_u:008.009a: tad idaṃ vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ mayā bhāgyaviparyayāt
GE07mbh_11_u:008.010a: ity uktvā tu mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ brahmavittamam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.010c: dhṛtarāṣṭro 'bhavan mūḍhaḥ śokaṃ ca paramaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.010e: abhūc ca tūṣṇīṃ rājāsau dhyāyamāno mahīpate
GE07mbh_11_u:008.011a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.012a: dhṛtarāṣṭra mahābāho yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_11_u:008.013a: na te 'sty aviditaṃ kiṃ cid veditavyaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_11_u:008.013c: anityatāṃ hi martyānāṃ vijānāsi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.014a: adhruve jīvaloke ca sthāne vāśāśvate sati
GE07mbh_11_u:008.014c: jīvite maraṇānte ca kasmāc chocasi bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:008.015c: putraṃ te kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā kālayogena kāritaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.016a: avaśyaṃ bhavitavye ca kurūṇāṃ vaiśase nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:008.016c: kasmāc chocasi tāñ śūrān gatān paramikāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:008.018a: na ca daivakṛto mārgaḥ śakyo bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_11_u:008.018c: ghaṭatāpi ciraṃ kālaṃ niyantum iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.019a: devatānāṃ hi yat kāryaṃ mayā pratyakṣataḥ śrutam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.019c: tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi kathaṃ sthairyaṃ bhavet tava
GE07mbh_11_u:008.020a: purāhaṃ tvarito yātaḥ sabhām aindrīṃ jitaklamaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.020c: apaśyaṃ tatra ca tadā samavetān divaukasaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.021a: tatra cāpi mayā dṛṣṭā pṛthivī pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_11_u:008.022a: upagamya tadā dhātrī devān āha samāgatān
GE07mbh_11_u:008.022c: yat kāryaṃ mama yuṣmābhir brahmaṇaḥ sadane tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:008.023a: tasyās tad vacanaṃ śrutvā viṣṇur lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.024a: dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇāṃ yas tu jyeṣṭhaḥ śatasya vai
GE07mbh_11_u:008.024c: duryodhana iti khyātaḥ sa te kāryaṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:008.024e: taṃ ca prāpya mahīpālaṃ kṛtakṛtyā bhaviṣyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:008.026a: tatas te bhavitā devi bhārasya yudhi nāśanam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.026c: gaccha śīghraṃ svakaṃ sthānaṃ lokān dhāraya śobhane
GE07mbh_11_u:008.027a: sa eṣa te suto rājaṃl lokasaṃhārakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_11_u:008.027c: kaler aṃśaḥ samutpanno gāndhāryā jaṭhare nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029-0030_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029a: śakunir mātulaś caiva karṇaś ca paramaḥ sakhā
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029d-0029_01: yādṛśo jāyate rājā tādṛśo 'sya jano bhavet
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029d-0029_02: adharmo dharmatāṃ yāti svāmī ced dhārmiko bhavet
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029d-0029_03: svāmino guṇadoṣābhyāṃ bhṛtyāḥ syur nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029d-0029_04: duṣṭaṃ rājānam āsādya gatās te tanayā nṛpa
GE07mbh_11_u:008.029e: etam arthaṃ mahābāho nārado veda tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.030c: mā tāñ śocasva rājendra na hi śoke 'sti kāraṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.031a: na hi te pāṇḍavāḥ svalpam aparādhyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:008.031c: putrās tava durātmāno yair iyaṃ ghātitā mahī
GE07mbh_11_u:008.032a: nāradena ca bhadraṃ te pūrvam eva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.033c: na bhaviṣyanti kaunteya yat te kṛtyaṃ tad ācara
GE07mbh_11_u:008.034c: etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ devaguhyaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.035a: kathaṃ te śokanāśaḥ syāt prāṇeṣu ca dayā prabho
GE07mbh_11_u:008.035c: snehaś ca pāṇḍuputreṣu jñātvā daivakṛtaṃ vidhim
GE07mbh_11_u:008.036a: eṣa cārtho mahābāho pūrvam eva mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.038a: anatikramaṇīyo hi vidhī rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_11_u:008.038c: kṛtāntasya hi bhūtena sthāvareṇa trasena ca
GE07mbh_11_u:008.039a: bhavān karmaparo yatra buddhiśreṣṭhaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:008.039c: muhyate prāṇināṃ jñātvā gatiṃ cāgatim eva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:008.040a: tvāṃ tu śokena saṃtaptaṃ muhyamānaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:008.040c: jñātvā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā prāṇān api parityajet
GE07mbh_11_u:008.041c: sa kathaṃ tvayi rājendra kṛpāṃ vai na kariṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:008.042a: mama caiva niyogena vidheś cāpy anivartanāt
GE07mbh_11_u:008.042c: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kāruṇyāt prāṇān dhāraya bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:008.043a: evaṃ te vartamānasya loke kīrtir bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:008.043c: dharmaś ca sumahāṃs tāta taptaṃ syāc ca tapaś cirāt
GE07mbh_11_u:008.047a: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā tava daivaniyogajam
GE07mbh_11_u:008.047c: dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ prāṇān yatiṣye ca naśocitum
GE07mbh_11_u:008.048a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ vyāsaḥ satyavatīsutaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001c: kim aceṣṭata viprarṣe tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0002: kṛpaprabhṛtayaś caiva kim akurvata te trayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0003: aśvatthāmnaḥ śrutaṃ karma śāpaś cānyonyakāritaḥ vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0004: vṛttāntam uttaraṃ brūhi yad abhāṣata saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0005: hate duryodhane caiva hate sainye ca sarvaśaḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0008: pitṛlokaṃ gatā rājan sarve tava sutaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0011: putrāṇām atha pautrāṇāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mahīpate
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0012: ānupūrvyeṇa sarveṣāṃ pretakāryāṇi kāraya vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0013: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ ghoraṃ saṃjayasya mahīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0017: uttiṣṭha rājan kiṃ śeṣe mā śuco bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0018: eṣā vai sarvasattvānāṃ lokeśvara parā gatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0021: na śocan mṛtam anveti na śocan mriyate naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0024: kālaṃ prāpya mahārāja na kaś cid ativartate
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0025: kālaḥ karṣati bhūtāni sarvāṇi vividhāny uta
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0026: na kālasya priyaḥ kaś cin na dveṣyaḥ kurusattama
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0030: yasya kālaḥ prayāty agre tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0031: yāṃś cāpi nihatān yuddhe rājaṃs tvam anuśocasi
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0032: aśocyā hi mahātmānaḥ sarve te tridivaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0033: na yajñair dakṣiṇāvadbhir na tapobhir na vidyayā
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0034: tathā svargam upāyānti yathā śūrās tanutyajaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0035: sarve vedavidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve ca caritavratāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0036: sarve cābhimukhāḥ kṣīṇās tatra kā paridevanā
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0039: evaṃ rājaṃs tavācakṣe svargyaṃ panthānam uttamam
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0040: na yuddhād adhikaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyasyeha vidyate
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0042: āśiṣaṃ paramāṃ prāptā na śocyāḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_11_u:009.001d-001_0044: nādya śokābhibhūtas tvaṃ kāryam utsraṣṭum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:009.002a: etac chrutvā naraśreṣṭha ciraṃ dhyātvā tv acetanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.002d-0031_01: vidurasya tu tad vākyaṃ śrutvā tu puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.002d-0031_02: yujyatāṃ yānam ity uktvā punar vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_11_u:009.003a: kṣipram ānaya gāndhārīṃ sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.003c: vadhūṃ kuntīm upādāya yāś cānyās tatra yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.004a: evam uktvā sa dharmātmā viduraṃ dharmavittamam
GE07mbh_11_u:009.005c: saha kuntyā yato rājā saha strībhir upādravat
GE07mbh_11_u:009.006c: āmantryānyonyam īyuḥ sma bhṛśam uccukruśus tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.007a: tāḥ samāśvāsayat kṣattā tābhyaś cārtataraḥ svayam
GE07mbh_11_u:009.009a: adṛṣṭapūrvā yā nāryaḥ purā devagaṇair api
GE07mbh_11_u:009.010a: prakīrya keśān suśubhān bhūṣaṇāny avamucya ca
GE07mbh_11_u:009.012a: tāny udīrṇāni nārīṇāṃ tadā vṛndāny anekaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.013a: pragṛhya bāhūn krośantyaḥ putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn api
GE07mbh_11_u:009.013c: darśayantīva tā ha sma yugānte lokasaṃkṣayam
GE07mbh_11_u:009.014a: vilapantyo rudantyaś ca dhāvamānās tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.015a: vrīḍāṃ jagmuḥ purā yāḥ sma sakhīnām api yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.016a: parasparaṃ susūkṣmeṣu śokeṣv āśvāsayan sma yāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.017c: niryayau nagarād dīnas tūrṇam āyodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_11_u:009.018c: te pārthivaṃ puraskṛtya niryayur nagarād bahiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:009.019c: prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdo vyathayan bhuvanāny uta
GE07mbh_11_u:009.020c: abhāvaḥ syād ayaṃ prāpta iti bhūtāni menire
GE07mbh_11_u:010.001a: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā dadṛśus tān mahārathān
GE07mbh_11_u:010.001c: śāradvataṃ kṛpaṃ drauṇiṃ kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:010.002a: te tu dṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ prajñācakṣuṣam īśvaram
GE07mbh_11_u:010.003a: putras tava mahārāja kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_11_u:010.004a: duryodhanabalān muktā vayam eva trayo rathāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.004c: sarvam anyat parikṣīṇaṃ sainyaṃ te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_11_u:010.005a: ity evam uktvā rājānaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvatas tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:010.006a: abhītā yudhyamānās te ghnantaḥ śatrugaṇān bahūn
GE07mbh_11_u:010.006c: vīrakarmāṇi kurvāṇāḥ putrās te nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.007a: dhruvaṃ saṃprāpya lokāṃs te nirmalāñ śastranirjitān
GE07mbh_11_u:010.007c: bhāsvaraṃ deham āsthāya viharanty amarā iva
GE07mbh_11_u:010.007d-0032_01: sarve hy abhimukhāḥ śūrā yudhyamānā hatāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.008a: na hi kaś cid dhi śūrāṇāṃ yudhyamānaḥ parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.008c: śastreṇa nidhanaṃ prāpto na ca kaś cit kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.009a: etāṃ tāṃ kṣatriyasyāhuḥ purāṇāṃ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:010.009c: śastreṇa nidhanaṃ saṃkhye tān na śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:010.010a: na cāpi śatravas teṣām ṛdhyante rājñi pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.011a: adharmeṇa hataṃ śrutvā bhīmasenena te sutam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.011c: suptaṃ śibiram āviśya pāṇḍūnāṃ kadanaṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.013c: prādravāma raṇe sthātuṃ na hi śakyāmahe trayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.014a: te hi śūrā maheṣvāsāḥ kṣipram eṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.015c: ninīṣantaḥ padaṃ śūrāḥ kṣipram eva yaśasvini
GE07mbh_11_u:010.016c: anujānīhi no rājñi mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.017a: rājaṃs tvam anujānīhi dhairyam ātiṣṭha cottamam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.017c: niṣṭhāntaṃ paśya cāpi tvaṃ kṣatradharmaṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.018a: ity evam uktvā rājānaṃ kṛtvā cābhipradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.018c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca droṇaputraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:010.019c: gaṅgām anu mahātmānas tūrṇam aśvān acodayan
GE07mbh_11_u:010.020a: apakramya tu te rājan sarva eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.020c: āmantryānyonyam udvignās tridhā te prayayus tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:010.021c: svam eva rāṣṭraṃ hārdikyo drauṇir vyāsāśramaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_11_u:010.022a: evaṃ te prayayur vīrā vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_11_u:010.023a: sametya vīrā rājānaṃ tadā tv anudite ravau
GE07mbh_11_u:011.003c: yuyudhānena ca tathā tathaiva ca yuyutsunā
GE07mbh_11_u:011.005a: sa gaṅgām anu vṛndāni strīṇāṃ bharatasattama
GE07mbh_11_u:011.007a: kva nu dharmajñatā rājñaḥ kva nu sādyānṛśaṃsatā
GE07mbh_11_u:011.007c: yadāvadhīt pitṝn bhrātṝn gurūn putrān sakhīn api
GE07mbh_11_u:011.008a: ghātayitvā kathaṃ droṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ cāpi pitāmaham
GE07mbh_11_u:011.008c: manas te 'bhūn mahābāho hatvā cāpi jayadratham
GE07mbh_11_u:011.009a: kiṃ nu rājyena te kāryaṃ pitṝn bhrātṝn apaśyataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.009c: abhimanyuṃ ca durdharṣaṃ draupadeyāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:011.010a: atītya tā mahābāhuḥ krośantīḥ kurarīr iva
GE07mbh_11_u:011.013c: duṣṭātmā bhīmam anvaicchad didhakṣur iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.015a: tasya saṃkalpam ājñāya bhīmaṃ praty aśubhaṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.015c: bhīmam ākṣipya pāṇibhyāṃ pradadau bhīmam āyasam
GE07mbh_11_u:011.016a: prāg eva tu mahābuddhir buddhvā tasyeṅgitaṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.017a: taṃ tu gṛhyaiva pāṇibhyāṃ bhīmasenam ayasmayam
GE07mbh_11_u:011.020a: paryagṛhṇata taṃ vidvān sūto gāvalgaṇis tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:011.020c: maivam ity abravīc cainaṃ śamayan sāntvayann iva
GE07mbh_11_u:011.021a: sa tu kopaṃ samutsṛjya gatamanyur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.021c: hā hā bhīmeti cukrośa bhūyaḥ śokasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.022c: vāsudevo varaḥ puṃsām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_11_u:011.023a: mā śuco dhṛtarāṣṭra tvaṃ naiṣa bhīmas tvayā hataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.023c: āyasī pratimā hy eṣā tvayā rājan nipātitā
GE07mbh_11_u:011.025a: na hi te rājaśārdūla bale tulyo 'sti kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:011.025c: kaḥ saheta mahābāho bāhvor nigrahaṇaṃ naraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:011.026a: yathāntakam anuprāpya jīvan kaś cin na mucyate
GE07mbh_11_u:011.026c: evaṃ bāhvantaraṃ prāpya tava jīven na kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:011.027a: tasmāt putreṇa yā sā te pratimā kāritāyasī
GE07mbh_11_u:011.028c: tava rājendra tena tvaṃ bhīmasenaṃ jighāṃsasi
GE07mbh_11_u:011.029a: na ca te tat kṣamaṃ rājan hanyās tvaṃ yad vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_11_u:011.029c: na hi putrā mahārāja jīveyus te kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_11_u:011.030a: tasmād yat kṛtam asmābhir manyamānaiḥ kṣamaṃ prati
GE07mbh_11_u:011.030c: anumanyasva tat sarvaṃ mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.002a: rājann adhītā vedās te śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_11_u:012.002c: śrutāni ca purāṇāni rājadharmāś ca kevalāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.003a: evaṃ vidvān mahāprājña nākārṣīr vacanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:012.003a-0035_02: ātmāparādhāt kasmāt tvaṃ kuruṣe kopam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_11_u:012.003a-0035_03: uktavāṃs tvāṃ tadaivāhaṃ bhīṣmadroṇau ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:012.003a-0035_04: viduraḥ saṃjayaś caiva tvaṃ tu rājan na tat kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.003c: pāṇḍavān adhikāñ jānan bale śaurye ca kaurava
GE07mbh_11_u:012.004a: rājā hi yaḥ sthiraprajñaḥ svayaṃ doṣān avekṣate
GE07mbh_11_u:012.004c: deśakālavibhāgaṃ ca paraṃ śreyaḥ sa vindati
GE07mbh_11_u:012.005a: ucyamānaṃ ca yaḥ śreyo gṛhṇīte no hitāhite
GE07mbh_11_u:012.005c: āpadaṃ samanuprāpya sa śocaty anaye sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.006c: rājaṃs tvaṃ hy avidheyātmā duryodhanavaśe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.007a: ātmāparādhād āyastas tat kiṃ bhīmaṃ jighāṃsasi
GE07mbh_11_u:012.007c: tasmāt saṃyaccha kopaṃ tvaṃ svam anusmṛtya duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_11_u:012.008a: yas tu tāṃ spardhayā kṣudraḥ pāñcālīm ānayat sabhām
GE07mbh_11_u:012.010a: evam uktaḥ sa kṛṣṇena sarvaṃ satyaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_11_u:012.011a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:012.011c: putrasnehas tu dharmātman dhairyān māṃ samacālayat
GE07mbh_11_u:012.012c: tvadgupto nāgamat kṛṣṇa bhīmo bāhvantaraṃ mama
GE07mbh_11_u:012.013a: idānīṃ tv aham ekāgro gatamanyur gatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:012.013c: madhyamaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ vīraṃ spraṣṭum icchāmi keśava
GE07mbh_11_u:012.014c: pāṇḍuputreṣu me śarma prītiś cāpy avatiṣṭhate
GE07mbh_11_u:012.015a: tataḥ sa bhīmaṃ ca dhanaṃjayaṃ ca; mādryāś ca putrau puruṣapravīrau
GE07mbh_11_u:012.015c: pasparśa gātraiḥ prarudan sugātrān; āśvāsya kalyāṇam uvāca cainān
GE07mbh_11_u:013.003a: tasyāḥ pāpam abhiprāyaṃ viditvā pāṇḍavān prati
GE07mbh_11_u:013.004a: sa gaṅgāyām upaspṛśya puṇyagandhaṃ payaḥ śuci
GE07mbh_11_u:013.006a: sa snuṣām abravīt kāle kalyavādī mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.007a: na kopaḥ pāṇḍave kāryo gāndhāri śamam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_11_u:013.007c: rajo nigṛhyatām etac chṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_11_u:013.008c: śivam āśāssva me mātar yudhyamānasya śatrubhiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.009a: sā tathā yācyamānā tvaṃ kāle kāle jayaiṣiṇā
GE07mbh_11_u:013.009c: uktavaty asi gāndhāri yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010a: na cāpy atītāṃ gāndhāri vācaṃ te vitathām aham
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010b-0036_01: vācā vyatīte mā krodhe manaḥ kuru yaśasvini
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010c: smarāmi bhāṣamāṇāyās tathā praṇihitā hy asi
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010d-0037_01: svaireṣv api ca kalyāṇi smarāmi subalātmaje
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010d-0038_01: vigrahe tumule rājñāṃ gatvā pāram asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010d-0038_02: jitaṃ pāṇḍusutair yuddhe nūnaṃ dharmas tato 'dhikaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010d-0039_01: kṣamāśīlā purā bhūtvā sādya na kṣamase katham
GE07mbh_11_u:013.010d-0039_02: adharmaṃ jahi dharmajñe yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.011a: sā tvaṃ dharmaṃ parismṛtya vācā coktvā manasvini
GE07mbh_11_u:013.011c: kopaṃ saṃyaccha gāndhāri maivaṃ bhūḥ satyavādini
GE07mbh_11_u:013.012c: putraśokena tu balān mano vihvalatīva me
GE07mbh_11_u:013.013a: yathaiva kuntyā kaunteyā rakṣitavyās tathā mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:013.015a: nāparādhyati bībhatsur na ca pārtho vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.015c: nakulaḥ sahadevo vā naiva jātu yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.016c: nihatāḥ sahitāś cānyais tatra nāsty apriyaṃ mama
GE07mbh_11_u:013.017a: yat tu karmākarod bhīmo vāsudevasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.018c: adho nābhyāṃ prahṛtavāṃs tan me kopam avardhayat
GE07mbh_11_u:013.019a: kathaṃ nu dharmaṃ dharmajñaiḥ samuddiṣṭaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:013.019c: tyajeyur āhave śūrāḥ prāṇahetoḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_11_u:014.001a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasyā bhīmaseno 'tha bhītavat
GE07mbh_11_u:014.002a: adharmo yadi vā dharmas trāsāt tatra mayā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.002c: ātmānaṃ trātukāmena tan me tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:014.003a: na hi yuddhena putras te dharmeṇa sa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.003c: śakyaḥ kena cid udyantum ato viṣamam ācaram
GE07mbh_11_u:014.003d-0040_01: adharmeṇa jitaḥ pūrvaṃ tena cāpi yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.003d-0040_02: nikṛtāś ca sadaiva sma tato viṣamam ācaram
GE07mbh_11_u:014.004c: māṃ hatvā na hared rājyam iti caitat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.005c: bhavatyā viditaṃ sarvam uktavān yat sutas tava
GE07mbh_11_u:014.006a: suyodhanam asaṃgṛhya na śakyā bhūḥ sasāgarā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.006c: kevalā bhoktum asmābhir ataś caitat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.007a: tac cāpy apriyam asmākaṃ putras te samupācarat
GE07mbh_11_u:014.007c: draupadyā yat sabhāmadhye savyam ūrum adarśayat
GE07mbh_11_u:014.008a: tatraiva vadhyaḥ so 'smākaṃ durācāro 'mba te sutaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.008c: dharmarājājñayā caiva sthitāḥ sma samaye tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.009a: vairam uddhukṣitaṃ rājñi putreṇa tava tan mahat
GE07mbh_11_u:014.009c: kleśitāś ca vane nityaṃ tata etat kṛtaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.010a: vairasyāsya gataḥ pāraṃ hatvā duryodhanaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_11_u:014.010c: rājyaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prāpto vayaṃ ca gatamanyavaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.011a: na tasyaiṣa vadhas tāta yat praśaṃsasi me sutam
GE07mbh_11_u:014.011c: kṛtavāṃś cāpi tat sarvaṃ yad idaṃ bhāṣase mayi
GE07mbh_11_u:014.012a: hatāśve nakule yat tad vṛṣasenena bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:014.013c: krūraṃ karmākaroḥ kasmāt tad ayuktaṃ vṛkodara
GE07mbh_11_u:014.014a: anyasyāpi na pātavyaṃ rudhiraṃ kiṃ punaḥ svakam
GE07mbh_11_u:014.014c: yathaivātmā tathā bhrātā viśeṣo nāsti kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:014.015a: rudhiraṃ na vyatikrāmad dantoṣṭhaṃ me 'mba mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.015c: vaivasvatas tu tad veda hastau me rudhirokṣitau
GE07mbh_11_u:014.015d-0041_01: mā kṛthā hṛdi tan mātar na tat pītaṃ mayānaghe
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0042_01: yat tu saṃjñām akaravaṃ pibāmy asṛg ahaṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0042_02: dantoṣṭhaṃ nābhicakrāma rudhiraṃ me ca mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0042_03: nāsṛk pātuṃ tvayā śakyaṃ mama saṃgrāmamūrdhani
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0042_04: vṛthā garjasi mūḍhas tvaṃ nistoyas toyado yathā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0042_06: vibhidya hṛdayaṃ pītaṃ rākṣasyā mama bhāryayā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.016d-0043_01: na pratijñām akaravaṃ pibāmy asṛg arer iti
GE07mbh_11_u:014.017c: krodhād yad abruvaṃ cāhaṃ tac ca me hṛdi vartate
GE07mbh_11_u:014.018a: kṣatradharmāc cyuto rājñi bhaveyaṃ śāsvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.018c: pratijñāṃ tām anistīrya tatas tat kṛtavān aham
GE07mbh_11_u:014.019a: na mām arhasi gāndhāri doṣeṇa pariśaṅkitum
GE07mbh_11_u:014.019d-0044_01: adhunā kiṃ tu doṣeṇa pariśaṅkitum arhasi
GE07mbh_11_u:014.020a: vṛddhasyāsya śataṃ putrān nighnaṃs tvam aparājitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:014.020c: kasmān na śeṣayaḥ kaṃ cid yenālpam aparādhitam
GE07mbh_11_u:014.021c: katham andhadvayasyāsya yaṣṭir ekā na varjitā
GE07mbh_11_u:014.022a: śeṣe hy avasthite tāta putrāṇām antake tvayi
GE07mbh_11_u:014.022c: na me duḥkhaṃ bhaved etad yadi tvaṃ dharmam ācaraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:015.001a: evam uktvā tu gāndhārī yudhiṣṭhiram apṛcchata
GE07mbh_11_u:015.002c: yudhiṣṭhira idaṃ caināṃ madhuraṃ vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_11_u:015.004a: na hi me jīvitenārtho na rājyena dhanena vā
GE07mbh_11_u:015.005c: novāca kiṃ cid gāndhārī niḥśvāsaparamā bhṛśam
GE07mbh_11_u:015.008a: evaṃ saṃceṣṭamānāṃs tān itaś cetaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:015.010a: cirasya dṛṣṭvā putrān sā putrādhibhir abhiplutā
GE07mbh_11_u:015.010c: bāṣpam āhārayad devī vastreṇāvṛtya vai mukham
GE07mbh_11_u:015.011a: tato bāṣpaṃ samutsṛjya saha putrais tathā pṛthā
GE07mbh_11_u:015.012a: sā tān ekaikaśaḥ putrān saṃspṛśantī punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:015.012e: rudatīm atha pāñcālīṃ dadarśa patitāṃ bhuvi
GE07mbh_11_u:015.013a: ārye pautrāḥ kva te sarve saubhadrasahitā gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:015.013e: kiṃ nu rājyena vai kāryaṃ vihīnāyāḥ sutair mama
GE07mbh_11_u:015.015a: tayaiva sahitā cāpi putrair anugatā pṛthā
GE07mbh_11_u:015.016a: tām uvācātha gāndhārī saha vadhvā yaśasvinīm
GE07mbh_11_u:015.016c: maivaṃ putrīti śokārtā paśya mām api duḥkhitām
GE07mbh_11_u:015.018a: idaṃ tat samanuprāptaṃ vidurasya vaco mahat
GE07mbh_11_u:015.019c: mā śuco na hi śocyās te saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:015.020a: yathaiva tvaṃ tathaivāhaṃ ko vā māśvāsayiṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:015.020c: mamaiva hy aparādhena kulam agryaṃ vināśitam
GE07mbh_11_u:016.001a: evam uktvā tu gāndhārī kurūṇām āvikartanam
GE07mbh_11_u:016.001c: apaśyat tatra tiṣṭhantī sarvaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_11_u:016.004a: dadarśa sā buddhimatī dūrād api yathāntike
GE07mbh_11_u:016.006c: śarīrair aśiraskaiś ca videhaiś ca śirogaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.011c: apaśyanta hatāṃs tatra putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn patīn
GE07mbh_11_u:016.012c: bhūtaiḥ piśācai rakṣobhir vividhaiś ca niśācaraiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.014c: śarīreṣv askhalann anyā nyapataṃś cāparā bhuvi
GE07mbh_11_u:016.015a: śrāntānāṃ cāpy anāthānāṃ nāsīt kā cana cetanā
GE07mbh_11_u:016.017c: kurūṇāṃ vaiśasaṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhād vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_11_u:016.019c: pṛthag evābhyadhāvanta putrān bhrātṝn pitṝn patīn
GE07mbh_11_u:016.020c: kva cic ca vīrapatnībhir hatavīrābhir ākulam
GE07mbh_11_u:016.022a: kāñcanaiḥ kavacair niṣkair maṇibhiś ca mahātmanām
GE07mbh_11_u:016.023c: khaḍgaiś ca vimalais tīkṣṇaiḥ saśaraiś ca śarāsanaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.024a: kravyādasaṃghair muditais tiṣṭhadbhiḥ sahitaiḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_11_u:016.024c: kva cid ākrīḍamānaiś ca śayānair aparaiḥ kva cit
GE07mbh_11_u:016.025b-0045_01: tvayā tu sādhitaṃ karma puṣkarākṣa mahādyute
GE07mbh_11_u:016.026c: pañcānām iva bhūtānāṃ nāhaṃ vadham acintayam
GE07mbh_11_u:016.027a: tān suparṇāś ca gṛdhrāś ca niṣkarṣanty asṛgukṣitān
GE07mbh_11_u:016.028c: abhimanyor vināśaṃ ca kaś cintayitum arhati
GE07mbh_11_u:016.031a: śayanāny ucitāḥ sarve mṛdūni vimalāni ca
GE07mbh_11_u:016.032c: śivānām aśivā ghorāḥ śṛṇvanti vividhā giraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.033a: ye purā śerate vīrāḥ śayaneṣu yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.034c: ākṣipanty aśivā ghorā vinadantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.035a: cāpāni viśikhān pītān nistriṃśān vimalā gadāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.038a: bibhrataḥ kavacāny anye vimalāny āyudhāni ca
GE07mbh_11_u:016.041c: stutibhiś ca parārdhyābhir upacāraiś ca śikṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.047a: etā dīrgham ivocchvasya vikruśya ca vilapya ca
GE07mbh_11_u:016.048a: bahvyo dṛṣṭvā śarīrāṇi krośanti vilapanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:016.049a: śirobhiḥ patitair hastaiḥ sarvāṅgair yūthaśaḥ kṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.050c: muhyanty anucitā nāryo videhāni śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_11_u:016.051c: apaśyantyo paraṃ tatra nedam asyeti duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.053c: dṛṣṭvā kāś cin na jānanti bhartṝn bharatayoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.054c: prekṣya bhrātṝn pitṝn putrān patīṃś ca nihatān paraiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.055a: bāhubhiś ca sakhaḍgaiś ca śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.056a: na duḥkheṣūcitāḥ pūrvaṃ duḥkhaṃ gāhanty aninditāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.058a: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu keśava pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_11_u:016.058c: yad imāḥ kurvate sarvā rūpam uccāvacaṃ striyaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:016.059a: nūnam ācaritaṃ pāpaṃ mayā pūrveṣu janmasu
GE07mbh_11_u:016.059c: yā paśyāmi hatān putrān pautrān bhrātṝṃś ca keśava
GE07mbh_11_u:016.059e: evam ārtā vilapatī dadarśa nihataṃ sutam
GE07mbh_11_u:017.001c: sahasā nyapatad bhūmau chinneva kadalī vane
GE07mbh_11_u:017.002a: sā tu labdhvā punaḥ saṃjñāṃ vikruśya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.005c: mām ayaṃ prāha vārṣṇeya prāñjalir nṛpasattamaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.005e: asmiñ jñātisamuddharṣe jayam ambā bravītu me
GE07mbh_11_u:017.006a: ity ukte jānatī sarvam ahaṃ svaṃ vyasanāgamam
GE07mbh_11_u:017.006b-0050_01: ity evam abruvaṃ naivaṃ yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.006c: abruvaṃ puruṣavyāghra yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.007a: yathā na yudhyamānas tvaṃ saṃpramuhyasi putraka
GE07mbh_11_u:017.007c: dhruvaṃ śastrajitāṃl lokān prāptāsy amaravad vibho
GE07mbh_11_u:017.008a: ity evam abruvaṃ pūrvaṃ nainaṃ śocāmi vai prabho
GE07mbh_11_u:017.009c: śayānaṃ vīraśayane paśya mādhava me sutam
GE07mbh_11_u:017.010c: so 'yaṃ pāṃsuṣu śete 'dya paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_11_u:017.011a: dhruvaṃ duryodhano vīro gatiṃ nasulabhāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.011c: tathā hy abhimukhaḥ śete śayane vīrasevite
GE07mbh_11_u:017.011d-0051_02: taṃ vīraśayane suptaṃ ramayanty aśivāḥ śivāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.013a: yaṃ purā vyajanair agryair upavījanti yoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.016a: akṣauhiṇīr mahābāhur daśa caikāṃ ca keśava
GE07mbh_11_u:017.016c: anayad yaḥ purā saṃkhye so 'nayān nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.018a: viduraṃ hy avamanyaiṣa pitaraṃ caiva mandabhāk
GE07mbh_11_u:017.019a: niḥsapatnā mahī yasya trayodaśa samāḥ sthitā
GE07mbh_11_u:017.019c: sa śete nihato bhūmau putro me pṛthivīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.020c: pūrṇāṃ hastigavāśvasya vārṣṇeya na tu tac ciram
GE07mbh_11_u:017.021c: hīnāṃ hastigavāśvena kiṃ nu jīvāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:017.022a: idaṃ kṛcchrataraṃ paśya putrasyāpi vadhān mama
GE07mbh_11_u:017.022c: yad imāḥ paryupāsante hatāñ śūrān raṇe striyaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:017.024a: nūnam eṣā purā bālā jīvamāne mahābhuje
GE07mbh_11_u:017.025a: kathaṃ tu śatadhā nedaṃ hṛdayaṃ mama dīryate
GE07mbh_11_u:017.025c: paśyantyā nihataṃ putraṃ putreṇa sahitaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_11_u:017.027a: kiṃ nu śocati bhartāraṃ putraṃ caiṣā manasvinī
GE07mbh_11_u:017.027c: tathā hy avasthitā bhāti putraṃ cāpy abhivīkṣya sā
GE07mbh_11_u:017.029c: mukhaṃ vimṛjya putrasya bhartuś caiva tapasvinī
GE07mbh_11_u:017.030a: yadi cāpy āgamāḥ santi yadi vā śrutayas tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:018.001a: paśya mādhava putrān me śatasaṃkhyāñ jitaklamān
GE07mbh_11_u:018.002a: idaṃ duḥkhataraṃ me 'dya yad imā muktamūrdhajāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:018.002c: hataputrā raṇe bālāḥ paridhāvanti me snuṣāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:018.004a: gṛdhrān utsārayantyaś ca gomāyūn vāyasāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_11_u:018.004c: śokenārtā vighūrṇantyo mattā iva caranty uta
GE07mbh_11_u:018.005c: ghoraṃ tad vaiśasaṃ dṛṣṭvā nipataty atiduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_11_u:018.007a: bhrātṝṃś cānyāḥ patīṃś cānyāḥ putrāṃś ca nihatān bhuvi
GE07mbh_11_u:018.007c: dṛṣṭvā paripatanty etāḥ pragṛhya subhujā bhujān
GE07mbh_11_u:018.010c: svasya bandhoḥ śiraḥ kṛṣṇa gṛhītvā paśya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_11_u:018.012a: tad idaṃ dharmarājena yātitaṃ no janārdana
GE07mbh_11_u:018.012c: na hi nāśo 'sti vārṣṇeya karmaṇoḥ śubhapāpayoḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:018.014c: sārasya iva vāśantyaḥ patitāḥ paśya mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:018.017c: raukmāṇi caiva varmāṇi niṣkān api ca kāñcanān
GE07mbh_11_u:018.018c: paśya dīptāni govinda pāvakān suhutān iva
GE07mbh_11_u:018.020a: gadayā vīraghātinyā paśya mādhava me sutam
GE07mbh_11_u:018.021a: uktā hy anena pāñcālī sabhāyāṃ dyūtanirjitā
GE07mbh_11_u:018.021c: priyaṃ cikīrṣatā bhrātuḥ karṇasya ca janārdana
GE07mbh_11_u:018.022c: dāsabhāryāsi pāñcāli kṣipraṃ praviśa no gṛhān
GE07mbh_11_u:018.023a: tato 'ham abruvaṃ kṛṣṇa tadā duryodhanaṃ nṛpam
GE07mbh_11_u:018.024c: kṣipram enaṃ parityajya putra śāmyasva pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:018.025a: na budhyase tvaṃ durbuddhe bhīmasenam amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:018.025c: vāṅnārācais tudaṃs tīkṣṇair ulkābhir iva kuñjaram
GE07mbh_11_u:018.026a: tān eṣa rabhasaḥ krūro vākśalyān avadhārayan
GE07mbh_11_u:018.026c: utsasarja viṣaṃ teṣu sarpo govṛṣabheṣv iva
GE07mbh_11_u:018.027a: eṣa duḥśāsanaḥ śete vikṣipya vipulau bhujau
GE07mbh_11_u:019.001a: eṣa mādhava putro me vikarṇaḥ prājñasaṃmataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.001c: bhūmau vinihataḥ śete bhīmena śatadhā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.003c: kathaṃ cic chidyate gṛdhrair attukāmais talatravān
GE07mbh_11_u:019.004c: vārayaty aniśaṃ bālā na ca śaknoti mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:019.005c: sukhocitaḥ sukhārhaś ca śete pāṃsuṣu mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:019.006c: adyāpi na jahāty enaṃ lakṣmīr bharatasattamam
GE07mbh_11_u:019.008c: vibhāty abhyadhikaṃ tāta saptamyām iva candramāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.009a: śūrasya hi raṇe kṛṣṇa yasyānanam athedṛśam
GE07mbh_11_u:019.009c: sa kathaṃ nihato 'mitraiḥ pāṃsūn grasati me sutaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.013c: citrarūpam idaṃ kṛṣṇa vicitraṃ pratibhāti me
GE07mbh_11_u:019.014c: viviṃśatir asau śete dhvastaḥ pāṃsuṣu mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:019.017c: atīva śubhraṃ vadanaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa viviṃśateḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.018a: yaṃ sma taṃ paryupāsante vasuṃ vāsavayoṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:019.021a: śātakaumbhyā srajā bhāti kavacena ca bhāsvatā
GE07mbh_11_u:019.021c: agnineva giriḥ śveto gatāsur api duḥsahaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.001a: adhyardhaguṇam āhur yaṃ bale śaurye ca mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:020.001c: pitrā tvayā ca dāśārha dṛptaṃ siṃham ivotkaṭam
GE07mbh_11_u:020.002a: yo bibheda camūm eko mama putrasya durbhidām
GE07mbh_11_u:020.002c: sa bhūtvā mṛtyur anyeṣāṃ svayaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.004c: ārtā bālā patiṃ vīraṃ śocyā śocaty aninditā
GE07mbh_11_u:020.005a: tam eṣā hi samāsādya bhāryā bhartāram antike
GE07mbh_11_u:020.009a: avekṣamāṇā taṃ bālā kṛṣṇa tvām abhibhāṣate
GE07mbh_11_u:020.010a: bale vīrye ca sadṛśas tejasā caiva te 'nagha
GE07mbh_11_u:020.010c: rūpeṇa ca tavātyarthaṃ śete bhuvi nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.011c: kaccid adya śarīraṃ te bhūmau na paritapyate
GE07mbh_11_u:020.013a: vyāyamya bahudhā nūnaṃ sukhasuptaḥ śramād iva
GE07mbh_11_u:020.013c: evaṃ vilapatīm ārtāṃ na hi mām abhibhāṣase
GE07mbh_11_u:020.013d-0054_01: na smarāmy aparādhaṃ te kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE07mbh_11_u:020.013d-0054_02: nanu māṃ tvaṃ purā dūrād abhivīkṣyābhibhāṣase
GE07mbh_11_u:020.014a: āryām ārya subhadrāṃ tvam imāṃś ca tridaśopamān
GE07mbh_11_u:020.014c: pitṝn māṃ caiva duḥkhārtāṃ vihāya kva gamiṣyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:020.015c: utsaṅge vaktram ādhāya jīvantam iva pṛcchati
GE07mbh_11_u:020.016a: kathaṃ tvāṃ raṇamadhyasthaṃ jaghnur ete mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.017c: ratharṣabhāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ katham āsīt tadā manaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.018a: bālaṃ tvāṃ parivāryaikaṃ mama duḥkhāya jaghnuṣām
GE07mbh_11_u:020.018c: kathaṃ nu pāṇḍavānāṃ ca pāñcālānāṃ ca paśyatām
GE07mbh_11_u:020.018e: tvaṃ vīra nidhanaṃ prāpto nāthavān sannanāthavat
GE07mbh_11_u:020.019a: dṛṣṭvā bahubhir ākrande nihataṃ tvām anāthavat
GE07mbh_11_u:020.020a: na rājyalābho vipulaḥ śatrūṇāṃ vā parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.020c: prītiṃ dāsyati pārthānāṃ tvām ṛte puṣkarekṣaṇa
GE07mbh_11_u:020.021a: tava śastrajitāṃl lokān dharmeṇa ca damena ca
GE07mbh_11_u:020.022a: durmaraṃ punar aprāpte kāle bhavati kena cit
GE07mbh_11_u:020.022c: yad ahaṃ tvāṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā hataṃ jīvāmi durbhagā
GE07mbh_11_u:020.023a: kām idānīṃ naravyāghra ślakṣṇayā smitayā girā
GE07mbh_11_u:020.024c: parameṇa ca rūpeṇa girā ca smitapūrvayā
GE07mbh_11_u:020.025c: saubhadra viharan kāle smarethāḥ sukṛtāni me
GE07mbh_11_u:020.026a: etāvān iha saṃvāso vihitas te mayā saha
GE07mbh_11_u:020.026c: ṣaṇmāsān saptame māsi tvaṃ vīra nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.028c: virāṭaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā krośanti vilapanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:020.031c: śrameṇa ca vivarṇānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ vigataṃ vapuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:020.032a: uttaraṃ cābhimanyuṃ ca kāmbojaṃ ca sudakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:020.032c: śiśūn etān hatān paśya lakṣmaṇaṃ ca sudarśanam
GE07mbh_11_u:021.004a: yaṃ sma pāṇḍavasaṃtrāsān mama putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:021.008a: anādhṛṣyaḥ parair yuddhe śatrubhir maghavān iva
GE07mbh_11_u:021.008c: yugāntāgnir ivārciṣmān himavān iva ca sthiraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:021.009a: sa bhūtvā śaraṇaṃ vīro dhārtarāṣṭrasya mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:021.009c: bhūmau vinihataḥ śete vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:021.010a: paśya karṇasya patnīṃ tvaṃ vṛṣasenasya mātaram
GE07mbh_11_u:021.011a: ācāryaśāpo 'nugato dhruvaṃ tvāṃ; yad agrasac cakram iyaṃ dharā te
GE07mbh_11_u:021.011c: tataḥ śareṇāpahṛtaṃ śiras te; dhanaṃjayenāhave śatrumadhye
GE07mbh_11_u:021.012a: aho dhig eṣā patitā visaṃjñā; samīkṣya jāmbūnadabaddhaniṣkam
GE07mbh_11_u:021.012c: karṇaṃ mahābāhum adīnasattvaṃ; suṣeṇamātā rudatī bhṛśārtā
GE07mbh_11_u:021.013a: alpāvaśeṣo hi kṛto mahātmā; śarīrabhakṣaiḥ paribhakṣayadbhiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:021.013c: draṣṭuṃ na saṃprītikaraḥ śaśīva; kṛṣṇaśya pakṣasya caturdaśāhe
GE07mbh_11_u:021.014a: sāvartamānā patitā pṛthivyām; utthāya dīnā punar eva caiṣā
GE07mbh_11_u:022.002a: taṃ paśya kadanaṃ kṛtvā śatrūṇāṃ madhusūdana
GE07mbh_11_u:022.003a: taṃ sṛgālāś ca kaṅkāś ca kravyādāś ca pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.003c: tena tena vikarṣanti paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_11_u:022.005c: prasuptam iva śārdūlaṃ paśya kṛṣṇa manasvinam
GE07mbh_11_u:022.008c: satyaṃ cikīrṣatā paśya hatam enaṃ jayadratham
GE07mbh_11_u:022.011b-0058_01: duḥṣalāṃ mānuṣaṃ te (sic) rakṣamāṇā mahābhujam sindhusauvīragāndhārakāmbojayavanastriyaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.012a: yadā kṛṣṇām upādāya prādravat kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_11_u:022.013a: duḥśalāṃ mānayadbhis tu yadā mukto jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.013c: katham adya na tāṃ kṛṣṇa mānayanti sma te punaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.014a: saiṣā mama sutā bālā vilapantī suduḥkhitā
GE07mbh_11_u:022.015a: kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ kṛṣṇa paraṃ mama bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:022.015c: yat sutā vidhavā bālā snuṣāś ca nihateśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.016a: aho dhig duḥśalāṃ paśya vītaśokabhayām iva
GE07mbh_11_u:022.016c: śiro bhartur anāsādya dhāvamānām itas tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.017a: vārayām āsa yaḥ sarvān pāṇḍavān putragṛddhinaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.017c: sa hatvā vipulāḥ senāḥ svayaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:022.018a: taṃ mattam iva mātaṅgaṃ vīraṃ paramadurjayam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.001a: eṣa śalyo hataḥ śete sākṣān nakulamātulaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.002a: yas tvayā spardhate nityaṃ sarvatra puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_11_u:023.002c: sa eṣa nihataḥ śete madrarājo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.002d-0059_01: jayadrathe yadi brūyur aparādhaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_11_u:023.003a: yena saṃgṛhṇatā tāta ratham ādhirather yudhi
GE07mbh_11_u:023.005c: āsyād viniḥsṛtā jihvā bhakṣyate kṛṣṇa pakṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.011a: yasya rukmamayī mālā śirasy eṣā virājate
GE07mbh_11_u:023.012a: etena kila pārthasya yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.014a: yasya nāsti samo loke śaurye vīrye ca kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:023.014c: sa eṣa nihataḥ śete bhīṣmo bhīṣmakṛd āhave
GE07mbh_11_u:023.015c: yugānta iva kālena pātitaṃ sūryam ambarāt
GE07mbh_11_u:023.016a: eṣa taptvā raṇe śatrūñ śastratāpena vīryavān
GE07mbh_11_u:023.018c: āviśya śete bhagavān skandaḥ śaravaṇaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_11_u:023.021c: amartya iva martyaḥ sann eṣa prāṇān adhārayat
GE07mbh_11_u:023.022a: nāsti yuddhe kṛtī kaś cin na vidvān na parākramī
GE07mbh_11_u:023.022c: yatra śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ śete 'dya nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.024a: pranaṣṭaḥ kuruvaṃśaś ca punar yena samuddhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.024c: sa gataḥ kurubhiḥ sārdhaṃ mahābuddhiḥ parābhavam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.025a: dharmeṣu kuravaḥ kaṃ nu pariprakṣyanti mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:023.026c: taṃ paśya patitaṃ droṇaṃ kurūṇāṃ gurusattamam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.027c: bhārgavo vā mahāvīryas tathā droṇo 'pi mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:023.028a: yasya prasādād bībhatsuḥ pāṇḍavaḥ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_11_u:023.028c: cakāra sa hataḥ śete nainam astrāṇy apālayan
GE07mbh_11_u:023.029a: yaṃ purodhāya kurava āhvayanti sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_11_u:023.029c: so 'yaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho droṇaḥ śastraiḥ pṛthak kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.030a: yasya nirdahataḥ senāṃ gatir agner ivābhavat
GE07mbh_11_u:023.030c: sa bhūmau nihataḥ śete śāntārcir iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.031a: dhanur muṣṭir aśīrṇaś ca hastāvāpaś ca mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:023.032a: vedā yasmāc ca catvāraḥ sarvāstrāṇi ca keśava
GE07mbh_11_u:023.033a: vandanārhāv imau tasya bandibhir vanditau śubhau
GE07mbh_11_u:023.035a: tāṃ paśya rudatīm ārtāṃ muktakeśīm adhomukhīm
GE07mbh_11_u:023.035c: hataṃ patim upāsantīṃ droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.036c: upāste vai mṛdhe droṇaṃ jaṭilā brahmacāriṇī
GE07mbh_11_u:023.037a: pretakṛtye ca yatate kṛpī kṛpaṇam āturā
GE07mbh_11_u:023.038a: agnīn āhṛtya vidhivac citāṃ prajvālya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.038c: droṇam ādhāya gāyanti trīṇi sāmāni sāmagāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.039a: kiranti ca citām ete jaṭilā brahmacāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:023.039c: dhanurbhiḥ śaktibhiś caiva rathanīḍaiś ca mādhava
GE07mbh_11_u:023.040a: śastraiś ca vividhair anyair dhakṣyante bhūritejasam
GE07mbh_11_u:023.040c: ta ete droṇam ādhāya śaṃsanti ca rudanti ca
GE07mbh_11_u:023.041c: agnāv agnim ivādhāya droṇaṃ hutvā hutāśane
GE07mbh_11_u:023.042c: apasavyāṃ citiṃ kṛtvā puraskṛtya kṛpīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_11_u:024.006a: diṣṭyā snuṣāṇām ākrande ghoraṃ vilapitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_11_u:024.008a: śvāpadair bhakṣyamāṇaṃ tvam aho diṣṭyā na paśyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:024.009a: śalaṃ vinihataṃ saṃkhye bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:024.009c: snuṣāś ca vidhavāḥ sarvā diṣṭyā nādyeha paśyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:024.010a: diṣṭyā tat kāñcanaṃ chatraṃ yūpaketor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.011a: amūs tu bhūriśravaso bhāryāḥ sātyakinā hatam
GE07mbh_11_u:024.012c: patanty abhimukhā bhūmau kṛpaṇaṃ bata keśava
GE07mbh_11_u:024.013c: pramattasya yad acchaitsīd bāhuṃ śūrasya yajvanaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.014a: tataḥ pāpataraṃ karma kṛtavān api sātyakiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.015a: eko dvābhyāṃ hataḥ śeṣe tvam adharmeṇa dhārmikaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.015b-0060_01: kiṃ nu vakṣyati vai satsu goṣṭhīṣu ca sabhāsu ca
GE07mbh_11_u:024.015b-0060_02: apuṇyam ayaśasyaṃ ca karmedaṃ sātyakiḥ svayam
GE07mbh_11_u:024.017d-0061_01: ayaṃ sa hantā śatrūṇāṃ mitrāṇām abhayapradaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.019a: kiṃ nu vakṣyasi saṃsatsu kathāsu ca janārdana
GE07mbh_11_u:024.019c: arjunasya mahat karma svayaṃ vā sa kirīṭavān
GE07mbh_11_u:024.020a: ity evaṃ garhayitvaiṣā tūṣṇīm āste varāṅganā
GE07mbh_11_u:024.020c: tām etām anuśocanti sapatnyaḥ svām iva snuṣām
GE07mbh_11_u:024.022a: yaḥ purā hemadaṇḍābhyāṃ vyajanābhyāṃ sma vījyate
GE07mbh_11_u:024.022c: sa eṣa pakṣibhiḥ pakṣaiḥ śayāna upavījyate
GE07mbh_11_u:024.023a: yaḥ sma rūpāṇi kurute śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.024c: sabhāyāṃ vipulaṃ rājyaṃ sa punar jīvitaṃ jitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.026a: etenaitan mahad vairaṃ prasaktaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_11_u:024.026c: vadhāya mama putrāṇām ātmanaḥ sagaṇasya ca
GE07mbh_11_u:024.027a: yathaiva mama putrāṇāṃ lokāḥ śastrajitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_11_u:024.027c: evam asyāpi durbuddher lokāḥ śastreṇa vai jitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:024.028a: kathaṃ ca nāyaṃ tatrāpi putrān me bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_11_u:024.028d-0062_01: śokārtā yat svasā kṛṣṇā kṛpaṇaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_11_u:024.028d-0062_02: vināśaṃ kāṅkṣatī nityaṃ putrāṇāṃ krudhyatī mama
GE07mbh_11_u:025.003c: yayor vivaram āpannāṃ na ratir māṃ purājahat
GE07mbh_11_u:025.004a: kāṃ gatiṃ nu gamiṣyāmi tvayā hīnā janeśvara
GE07mbh_11_u:025.005c: klāntānām api nārīṇāṃ na śrīr jahati vai tanum
GE07mbh_11_u:025.013b-0063_03: droṇam āsādya nirdagdhāḥ śalabhā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_11_u:025.014c: bhāsayanti mahīṃ bhāsā jvalitā iva pāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.015a: droṇena drupadaṃ saṃkhye paśya mādhava pātitam
GE07mbh_11_u:025.017a: etās tu drupadaṃ vṛddhaṃ snuṣā bhāryāś ca duḥkhitāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.019b-0064_01: evaṃ mām iha putrasya putraḥ pitaram anvagāt
GE07mbh_11_u:025.019c: maheṣvāso hataḥ śete nadyā hṛta iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.020c: śete vinihataḥ saṃkhye hatvā śatrūn sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.023c: droṇena samare paśya nikṛttaṃ bahudhā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.024a: pitaraṃ nūnam ājisthaṃ yudhyamānaṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_11_u:025.025a: evaṃ mamāpi putrasya putraḥ pitaram anvagāt
GE07mbh_11_u:025.026c: himānte puṣpitau śālau marutā galitāv iva
GE07mbh_11_u:025.028a: avadhyāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa sarva eva tvayā saha
GE07mbh_11_u:025.028c: ye muktā droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ karṇād vaikartanāt kṛpāt
GE07mbh_11_u:025.029c: somadattād vikarṇāc ca śūrāc ca kṛtavarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.029e: ye hanyuḥ śastravegena devān api nararṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.030a: ta ime nihatāḥ saṃkhye paśya kālasya paryayam
GE07mbh_11_u:025.030c: nātibhāro 'sti daivasya dhruvaṃ mādhava kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:025.030e: yad ime nihatāḥ śūrāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.030f-0065_01: śūrāś ca kṛtavidyāś ca mama putrā manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.031a: tadaiva nihatāḥ kṛṣṇa mama putrās tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.032a: śaṃtanoś caiva putreṇa prājñena vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_11_u:025.033a: tayor na darśanaṃ tāta mithyā bhavitum arhati
GE07mbh_11_u:025.034a: ity uktvā nyapatad bhūmau gāndhārī śokakarśitā
GE07mbh_11_u:025.036a: pāṇḍavā dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca drugdhāḥ kṛṣṇa parasparam
GE07mbh_11_u:025.038c: yasmāt tvayā mahābāho phalaṃ tasmād avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_11_u:025.039a: patiśuśrūṣayā yan me tapaḥ kiṃ cid upārjitam
GE07mbh_11_u:025.040c: upekṣitās te govinda tasmāj jñātīn vadhiṣyasi
GE07mbh_11_u:025.041a: tvam apy upasthite varṣe ṣaṭtriṃśe madhusūdana
GE07mbh_11_u:025.043a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ ghoraṃ vāsudevo mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.043c: uvāca devīṃ gāndhārīm īṣad abhyutsmayann iva
GE07mbh_11_u:025.044a: saṃhartā vṛṣṇicakrasya nānyo mad vidyate śubhe
GE07mbh_11_u:025.044c: jāne 'ham etad apy evaṃ cīrṇaṃ carasi kṣatriye
GE07mbh_11_u:025.044d-0067_01: daivād eva vinaśyanti vṛṣṇayo nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:025.045a: avadhyās te narair anyair api vā devadānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.001a: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha gāndhāri mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.001c: tavaiva hy aparādhena kuravo nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.002a: yā tvaṃ putraṃ durātmānam īrṣum atyantamāninam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.003c: katham ātmakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mayy ādhātum ihecchasi
GE07mbh_11_u:026.004a: mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītam anuśocati
GE07mbh_11_u:026.004c: duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
GE07mbh_11_u:026.005a: taporthīyaṃ brāhmaṇī dhatta garbhaṃ; gaur voḍhāraṃ dhāvitāraṃ turaṃgī
GE07mbh_11_u:026.005c: śūdrā dāsaṃ paśupālaṃ tu vaiśyā; vadhārthīyaṃ tvadvidhā rājaputrī
GE07mbh_11_u:026.008c: hatānāṃ yadi jānīṣe parimāṇaṃ vadasva me
GE07mbh_11_u:026.009c: koṭyaḥ ṣaṣṭiś ca ṣaṭ caiva ye 'smin rājamṛdhe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.010c: daśa cānyāni rājendra śataṃ ṣaṣṭiś ca pañca ca
GE07mbh_11_u:026.011a: yudhiṣṭhira gatiṃ kāṃ te gatāḥ puruṣasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.011b-0068_01: keṣu keṣu ca lokeṣu gatā hy ete narottamāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.011c: ācakṣva me mahābāho sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.013a: ye tv ahṛṣṭena manasā martavyam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:026.013c: yudhyamānā hatāḥ saṃkhye te gandharvaiḥ samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.014c: śastreṇa nidhanaṃ prāptā gatās te guhyakān prati
GE07mbh_11_u:026.014d-0069_01: kṣatradharmeṇa nihatās te gatāḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_11_u:026.015a: pīḍyamānāḥ parair ye tu hīyamānā nirāyudhāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.016c: gatās te brahmasadanaṃ hatā vīrāḥ suvarcasaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.017a: ye tatra nihatā rājann antar āyodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_11_u:026.017c: yathā kathaṃ cit te rājan saṃprāptā uttarān kurūn
GE07mbh_11_u:026.018c: tan me vada mahābāho śrotavyaṃ yadi vai mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:026.019a: nideśād bhavataḥ pūrvaṃ vane vicaratā mayā
GE07mbh_11_u:026.020a: devarṣir lomaśo dṛṣṭas tataḥ prāpto 'smy anusmṛtim
GE07mbh_11_u:026.020c: divyaṃ cakṣur api prāptaṃ jñānayogena vai purā
GE07mbh_11_u:026.021a: ye 'trānāthā janasyāsya sanāthā ye ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:026.022a: na yeṣāṃ santi kartāro na ca ye 'trāhitāgnayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.022c: vayaṃ ca kasya kuryāmo bahutvāt tāta karmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.023a: yān suparṇāś ca gṛdhrāś ca vikarṣanti tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.023c: teṣāṃ tu karmaṇā lokā bhaviṣyanti yudhiṣṭhira
GE07mbh_11_u:026.024c: ādideśa sudharmāṇaṃ dhaumyaṃ sūtaṃ ca saṃjayam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.025a: viduraṃ ca mahābuddhiṃ yuyutsuṃ caiva kauravam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.025c: indrasenamukhāṃś caiva bhṛtyān sūtāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.026c: yathā cānāthavat kiṃ cic charīraṃ na vinaśyati
GE07mbh_11_u:026.027a: śāsanād dharmarājasya kṣattā sūtaś ca saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.028c: ghṛtaṃ tailaṃ ca gandhāṃś ca kṣaumāṇi vasanāni ca
GE07mbh_11_u:026.029c: rathāṃś ca mṛditāṃs tatra nānāpraharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_11_u:026.031a: duryodhanaṃ ca rājānaṃ bhrātṝṃś cāsya śatādhikān
GE07mbh_11_u:026.031c: śalyaṃ śalaṃ ca rājānaṃ bhūriśravasam eva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:026.032a: jayadrathaṃ ca rājānam abhimanyuṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_11_u:026.032c: dauḥśāsaniṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.033a: bṛhantaṃ somadattaṃ ca sṛñjayāṃś ca śatādhikān
GE07mbh_11_u:026.034a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca pāñcālyaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.034c: yudhāmanyuṃ ca vikrāntam uttamaujasam eva ca
GE07mbh_11_u:026.035a: kausalyaṃ draupadeyāṃś ca śakuniṃ cāpi saubalam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.035c: acalaṃ vṛṣakaṃ caiva bhagadattaṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.036c: kekayāṃś ca maheṣvāsāṃs trigartāṃś ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_11_u:026.037c: alambusaṃ ca rājānaṃ jalasaṃdhaṃ ca pārthivam
GE07mbh_11_u:026.038a: anyāṃś ca pārthivān rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.038b-0070_01: citāḥ kṛtvā maheṣvāsān sarvān etān yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_11_u:026.039a: pitṛmedhāś ca keṣāṃ cid avartanta mahātmanām
GE07mbh_11_u:026.040a: sāmnām ṛcāṃ ca nādena strīṇāṃ ca ruditasvanaiḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.041a: te vidhūmāḥ pradīptāś ca dīpyamānāś ca pāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:026.042c: tāṃś ca sarvān samānāyya rāśīn kṛtvā sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.001a: te samāsādya gaṅgāṃ tu śivāṃ puṇyajanocitām
GE07mbh_11_u:027.002c: tataḥ pitṝṇāṃ pautrāṇāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ svajanasya ca
GE07mbh_11_u:027.003a: putrāṇām āryakāṇāṃ ca patīnāṃ ca kurustriyaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.006c: rudatī mandayā vācā putrān vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_11_u:027.008a: yaṃ sūtaputraṃ manyadhvaṃ rādheyam iti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.008c: yo vyarājac camūmadhye divākara iva prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.009a: pratyayudhyata yaḥ sarvān purā vaḥ sapadānugān
GE07mbh_11_u:027.010a: yasya nāsti samo vīrye pṛthivyām api kaś cana
GE07mbh_11_u:027.010b-0073_01: yo 'vṛṇīta yaśaḥ śūraḥ prāṇair api sadā bhuvi
GE07mbh_11_u:027.011c: sa hi vaḥ pūrvajo bhrātā bhāskarān mayy ajāyata
GE07mbh_11_u:027.011f-0074_06: mama priyakaro nityaṃ putrāṇāṃ rakṣakaś ca ha
GE07mbh_11_u:027.012a: śrutvā tu pāṇḍavāḥ sarve mātur vacanam apriyam
GE07mbh_11_u:027.013c: uvāca mātaraṃ vīro niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.014c: kathaṃ putro bhavatyāṃ sa devagarbhaḥ purābhavat
GE07mbh_11_u:027.015c: tam agnim iva vastreṇa kathaṃ chāditavaty asi
GE07mbh_11_u:027.015f-0076_02: bhūmipānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ balaṃ balavatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.016a: nānyaḥ kuntīsutāt karṇād agṛhṇād rathināṃ rathī
GE07mbh_11_u:027.016c: sa naḥ prathamajo bhrātā sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.016e: asūta taṃ bhavaty agre katham adbhutavikramam
GE07mbh_11_u:027.017a: aho bhavatyā mantrasya pidhānena vayaṃ hatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.017c: nidhanena hi karṇasya pīḍitāḥ sma sabāndhavāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.018c: pāñcālānāṃ ca nāśena kurūṇāṃ patanena ca
GE07mbh_11_u:027.019a: tataḥ śataguṇaṃ duḥkham idaṃ mām aspṛśad bhṛśam
GE07mbh_11_u:027.019c: karṇam evānuśocan hi dahyāmy agnāv ivāhitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.020a: na hi sma kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ bhaved api divi sthitam
GE07mbh_11_u:027.020c: na ca sma vaiśasaṃ ghoraṃ kauravāntakaraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_11_u:027.022a: tato vineduḥ sahasā strīpuṃsās tatra sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.022c: abhito ye sthitās tatra tasminn udakakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_11_u:027.023c: striyaḥ kurupatir dhīmān bhrātuḥ premṇā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024a: sa tābhiḥ saha dharmātmā pretakṛtyam anantaram
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024b-0078_01: aho bhavatyā mantrasya gopanena vayaṃ hatāḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024b-0079_02: sa rājā dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kṛtvā jalam atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024b-0080_02: pāpenāsau mayā śreṣṭho bhrātā jñātir nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024b-0080_03: ato manasi yad guhyaṃ strīṇāṃ tan na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024d-0083_03: mānasaṃ vācikaṃ caiva kāyikaṃ yac ca duṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024d-0083_05: putrapautraiḥ parivṛta iha loke sukhaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_11_u:027.024d-0083_06: muktvā ca sakalāl lokān indraloke mahīyate
